item.title: By: jayo
item.dc:creator: jayo
item.description: Hi, the dish looks great and am dying to try it out...but im a started and wanted know what zest is? may be a silly question.. but would be thankful if you would let me know..
item.content:encoded: Hi, the dish looks great and am dying to try it out…but im a started and wanted know what zest is? may be a silly question.. but would be thankful if you would let me know..

item.title: By: Beta Gal
item.dc:creator: Beta Gal
item.description: I saw that episode and was completely blown away by that tart! It really looked like the dish of the battle. Congratulations on your beautiful homage to the original. What did you think of the taste? Was it better than a "constructed" lemon tart?
item.content:encoded: I saw that episode and was completely blown away by that tart! It really looked like the dish of the battle. Congratulations on your beautiful homage to the original. What did you think of the taste? Was it better than a “constructed” lemon tart?

item.description: This is so pretty! And I love all the different textures and layers...what a wonderfully creative post :-)

item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: As I love lemon I found this dessert lovely, it would be a really good dessert to eat during summer as it is very refreshing. Anita, your pictures are just fantastic and what a beautiful orchid!!!
item.content:encoded:
As I love lemon I found this dessert lovely, it would be a really good dessert to eat during summer as it is very refreshing.
Anita, your pictures are just fantastic and what a beautiful orchid!!!
